Anyone have the torrent for the HIGH version 2007 for the E39 1997 -2003 models

Rebooting iDrive 
(simultaneously hold mute + CD eject + DVD eject until system turns off and restarts).

to restart the GPS you need to turn off the car and then turn it back on. thats all after that the disc will load.

** when you turn the car off wait from 30 secs to 1 min before turning back on
